channel.title: Experiments on Differential Facts
channel.description: Recent content in Experiments on Differential Facts

item.title: Semantic History Slicing
item.description: Detailed Data In the following table, we list relevant data of tested projects to show how facts re-using bring efficiency improvement. Test column: "static" means all other facts except coverage information for each functionality, all other numbers such as 288 is the functionality ID used in the DoSC data set, i.e. IO-288. Three Facts columns (#Fact, Ext, Query): shows number of lines of facts generated, time used for extraction and time used for querying.

item.title: Lifted Pointer Analysis
item.description: Time usage decomposition Lifted analysis on multiple versions consists of three steps: Extract facts on each version Merge into version-annotated representation Run lifted Analysis on version-annotated facts Time decomposition by each step is shown below: Project Extract Merge Analysis CSV 93.88% 0.14% 5.98% IO 93% 0.6% 6.4% CONFIG 97.
